summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1888, for the improvement of West McGraw Street, from the east margin of Third Avenue West to Seventh Avenue West, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 19556, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
